AI Description: tfold is a software tool designed for predicting RNA secondary structures and folding energies. It uses thermodynamic parameters to predict the minimum free energy (MFE) secondary structure of RNA sequences.
Core Features: Prediction Of RNA Secondary Structures, Estimation Of Folding Energies, Calculation Of Minimum Free Energy (Mfe) Secondary Structures
General Tags: RNA Secondary Structures, RNA Folding, Thermodynamic Parameters, Prediction Tool
